import numpy as np

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from scipy import stats
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
source.ba20b0e4:
def find_outliers(df, col):
    Q1 = df[col].quantile(0.25)
    Q3 = df[col].quantile(0.75)
    IQR = Q3 - Q1
    return df[(df[col] < Q1 - 1.5*IQR) | (df[col] > Q3 + 1.5*IQR)].shape
source.3626abbc:
def remove_outliers(df,col):
    sorted(df[col])
    Q1 = df[col].quantile(0.25)
    Q3 = df[col].quantile(0.75)
    IQR = Q3 - Q1
    upper = Q3 + 1.5*IQR
    lower = Q1 - 1.5*IQR
    df[col] = np.where(df[col] > upper, upper, df[col])
    df[col] = np.where(df[col] < lower, lower, df[col])
    return df[col]
source.d7bb2b6f:
for col in int_float_cols.columns:
    int_float_cols[col] = remove_outliers(int_float_cols, col)
